title: FT. Two graded for raw cards CLOSED!!
author: xplainer

posts.post_title: FT. Two graded for raw cards CLOSED!!
posts.post_content:
Anyone up for trading a couple of graded cards for some raws?
My only real requirement is no paper loss.

SGC "A" Sweet Caporal Heinie Wagner (1365597-012)
SGC "10" Piedmont Jimmy Lavender (1277669-110)

I've found I prefer raw cards over graded. I like my binder. Easy to store and to look at my collection. 

Anyone interested in trading for one or both?

Thanks.
-Jimmy
